department.ch: 生醫科學與工程學系系統生物與生物資訊碩士班
department.en: Master Program in Systems Biology and Bioinformatics, Department of Biomedical Sciences and Engineering

goal.ch: 將邀請不同生物領域的學者至系所演講，讓學生能快速了解各領域的研究重點。
goal.en: In this course, researchers from different kinds of biological fields are invited to give speeches in our department such that students can understand the important topics in each biological field.
